data.title: New Most Recent Common Ancestor of Reigning European Monarchs
data.meta_description: According to Wikipedia, the most recent common ancestor of all reigning European monarchs is now Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt. I checked to see...
data.text:
According to Wikipedia, the most recent common ancestor of all reigning European monarchs is now Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt. I checked to see how they trace descent from him, and this is how it goes:

United Kingdom

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Frederica Louisa of Hesse-Darmstadt, Queen of Prussia->King Frederick William III of Prussia->Tsarina Alexandra Feodorovna (née Princess Charlotte of Prussia)->Grand Duke Konstantin Nikolayevich of Russia->Olga Constantinovna of Russia, Queen of Greece->Prince Andrew of Greece and Denmark->Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh->King Charles III

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Grand Duke Louis I of Hesse->Grand Duke Louis II of Hesse->Prince Alexander of Hesse and by Rhine->Prince Louis of Battenberg, 1st Marquess of Milford Haven->Princess Alice of Battenberg, Princess Andrew of Greece and Denmark->Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh->King Charles III

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Grand Duke Louis I of Hesse->Grand Duke Louis II of Hesse->Prince Charles of Hesse and by Rhine->Grand Duke Louis IV of Hesse->Princess Victoria of Hesse and by Rhine, Marchioness of Milford Haven->Princess Alice of Battenberg, Princess Andrew of Greece and Denmark->Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh->King Charles III

Spain

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Grand Duke Louis I of Hesse->Grand Duke Louis II of Hesse->Prince Alexander of Hesse and by Rhine->Prince Henry of Battenberg->Victoria Eugenie of Battenberg, Queen of Spain->Infante Juan, Count of Barcelona->King Juan Carlos I->King Felipe VI

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Amalie of Hesse-Darmstadt, Hereditary Princess of Baden->Wilhelmine of Baden, Grand Duchess of Hesse and by Rhine->Prince Alexander of Hesse and by Rhine->Prince Henry of Battenberg->Victoria Eugenie of Battenberg, Queen of Spain->Infante Juan, Count of Barcelona->King Juan Carlos I->King Felipe VI

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Frederica Louisa of Hesse-Darmstadt, Queen of Prussia->King Frederick William III of Prussia->Tsarina Alexandra Feodorovna (née Princess Charlotte of Prussia)->Grand Duke Konstantin Nikolayevich of Russia->Olga Constantinovna of Russia, Queen of Greece->King Constantine I of Greece->King Paul of Greece->Sofía of Greece and Denmark, Queen of Spain->King Felipe VI

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Frederica Louisa of Hesse-Darmstadt, Queen of Prussia->King Frederick William III of Prussia->William I, German Emperor->Frederick III, German Emperor->Sophia of Prussia, Queen of Greece->King Paul of Greece->Sofía of Greece and Denmark, Queen of Spain->King Felipe VI

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Frederica Louisa of Hesse-Darmstadt, Queen of Prussia->King Frederick William III of Prussia->William I, German Emperor->Frederick III, German Emperor->Wilhelm II, German Emperor->Victoria Louise of Prussia, Duchess consort of Brunswick->Frederica of Hanover, Queen of Greece->Sofía of Greece and Denmark, Queen of Spain->King Felipe VI

Netherlands

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Frederica Louisa of Hesse-Darmstadt, Queen of Prussia->Wilhelmine of Prussia, Queen of the Netherlands->King William II->King William II->Queen Wilhelmina->Queen Juliana->Queen Beatrix->King Willem-Alexander

Belgium

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Amalie of Hesse-Darmstadt, Hereditary Princess of Baden->Grand Duke Charles of Baden->Josephine of Baden, Princess of Hohenzollern-Sigmaringen->Marie of Hohenzollern-Sigmaringen, Countess of Flanders->King Albert I->King Leopold III->King Albert II->King Philippe

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Frederica Louisa of Hesse-Darmstadt, Queen of Prussia->Wilhelmine of Prussia, Queen of the Netherlands->Prince Frederick of the Netherlands->Louise of the Netherlands, Queen of Sweden and Norway->Louise of Sweden, Queen of Denmark->Princess Ingeborg of Denmark, Duchess of Västergötland->Astrid of Sweden, Queen of the Belgians->King Albert II->King Philippe

Sweden

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Amalie of Hesse-Darmstadt, Hereditary Princess of Baden->Frederica of Baden, Queen of Sweden->Sophie of Sweden, Grand Duchess of Baden->Grand Duke Frederick I of Baden->Victoria of Baden, Queen of Sweden->King Gustaf VI Adolf->Prince Gustaf Adolf, Duke of Västerbotten->King Carl XVI Gustaf

Norway

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Frederica Louisa of Hesse-Darmstadt, Queen of Prussia->Wilhelmine of Prussia, Queen of the Netherlands->Prince Frederick of the Netherlands->Louise of the Netherlands, Queen of Sweden and Norway->Louise of Sweden, Queen of Denmark->King Haakon VII (né Prince Carl of Denmark)->King Olav V->King Harald V

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Frederica Louisa of Hesse-Darmstadt, Queen of Prussia->Wilhelmine of Prussia, Queen of the Netherlands->Prince Frederick of the Netherlands->Louise of the Netherlands, Queen of Sweden and Norway->Louise of Sweden, Queen of Denmark->Princess Ingeborg of Denmark, Duchess of Västergötland->Märtha of Sweden, Crown Princess of Norway->King Harald V

Denmark

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Frederica Louisa of Hesse-Darmstadt, Queen of Prussia->Wilhelmine of Prussia, Queen of the Netherlands->Prince Frederick of the Netherlands->Louise of the Netherlands, Queen of Sweden and Norway->Louise of Sweden, Queen of Denmark->King Christian X->King Frederick IX->Queen Margrethe II

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Amalie of Hesse-Darmstadt, Hereditary Princess of Baden->Frederica of Baden, Queen of Sweden->Sophie of Sweden, Grand Duchess of Baden->Grand Duke Frederick I of Baden->Victoria of Baden, Queen of Sweden->King Gustaf VI Adolf->Ingrid of Sweden, Queen of Denmark->Queen Margrethe II

Luxembourg

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Caroline of Hesse-Darmstadt, Landgravine consort of Hesse-Homburg->Princess Amalie of Hesse-Homburg, Hereditary Princess of Anhalt-Dessau->Prince Frederick Augustus of Anhalt-Dessau->Adelheid-Marie of Anhalt-Dessau, Grand Duchess of Luxembourg->Grand Duke William IV->Grand Duchess Charlotte->Grand Duke Jean->Grand Duke Henri

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Amalie of Hesse-Darmstadt, Hereditary Princess of Baden->Grand Duke Charles of Baden->Josephine of Baden, Princess of Hohenzollern-Sigmaringen->Marie of Hohenzollern-Sigmaringen, Countess of Flanders->King Albert I of Belgium->King Leopold III of Belgium->Josephine-Charlotte of Belgium, Grand Duchess of Luxembourg->Grand Duke Henri

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Frederica Louisa of Hesse-Darmstadt, Queen of Prussia->Wilhelmine of Prussia, Queen of the Netherlands->Prince Frederick of the Netherlands->Louise of the Netherlands, Queen of Sweden and Norway->Louise of Sweden, Queen of Denmark->Princess Ingeborg of Denmark, Duchess of Västergötland->Astrid of Sweden, Queen of the Belgians->Josephine-Charlotte of Belgium, Grand Duchess of Luxembourg->Grand Duke Henri

Liechtenstein

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Amalie of Hesse-Darmstadt, Hereditary Princess of Baden->Caroline of Baden, Queen of Bavaria->Sophie of Bavaria, Archduchess Franz Karl of Austria->Archduke Karl Ludwig of Austria->Elisabeth Amalie of Austria, Princess Elisabeth of Liechtenstein->Franz Joseph II, Prince of Liechtenstein->Hans-Adam II, Prince of Liechtenstein

Monaco

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Amalie of Hesse-Darmstadt, Hereditary Princess of Baden->Grand Duke Charles of Baden->Marie Amelie of Baden, Duchess of Hamilton and Brandon->Lady Mary Victoria Douglas-Hamilton, Hereditary Princess of Monaco->Louis II, Prince of Monaco->Princess Charlotte, Duchess of Valentinois->Rainier III, Prince of Monaco->Albert II, Prince of Monaco

Just for fun, I'm also including some non-reigning royals (excluding the subnational German royals).

Greece

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Frederica Louisa of Hesse-Darmstadt, Queen of Prussia->King Frederick William III of Prussia->Tsarina Alexandra Feodorovna (née Princess Charlotte of Prussia)->Grand Duke Konstantin Nikolayevich of Russia->Olga Constantinovna of Russia, Queen of Greece->King Constantine I->King Paul->King Constantine II

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Frederica Louisa of Hesse-Darmstadt, Queen of Prussia->King Frederick William III of Prussia->William I, German Emperor->Frederick III, German Emperor->Sophia of Prussia, Queen of Greece->King Paul->King Constantine II

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Frederica Louisa of Hesse-Darmstadt, Queen of Prussia->King Frederick William III of Prussia->William I, German Emperor->Frederick III, German Emperor->Wilhelm II, German Emperor->Victoria Louise of Prussia, Duchess consort of Brunswick->Frederica of Hanover, Queen of Greece->King Constantine II

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Frederica Louisa of Hesse-Darmstadt, Queen of Prussia->Wilhelmine of Prussia, Queen of the Netherlands->Prince Frederick of the Netherlands->Louise of the Netherlands, Queen of Sweden and Norway->Louise of Sweden, Queen of Denmark->King Christian X->King Frederick IX->Anne-Marie of Denmark, Queen of Greece

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Amalie of Hesse-Darmstadt, Hereditary Princess of Baden->Frederica of Baden, Queen of Sweden->Sophie of Sweden, Grand Duchess of Baden->Grand Duke Frederick I of Baden->Victoria of Baden, Queen of Sweden->King Gustaf VI Adolf->Ingrid of Sweden, Queen of Denmark->Anne-Marie of Denmark, Queen of Greece

Romania

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Amalie of Hesse-Darmstadt, Hereditary Princess of Baden->Grand Duke Charles of Baden->Josephine of Baden, Princess of Hohenzollern-Sigmaringen->Leopold, Prince of Hohenzollern->King Ferdinand I->King Carol II->King Michael I->Crown Princess Margareta

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Grand Duke Louis I of Hesse->Grand Duke Louis II of Hesse->Tsarina Maria Alexandrovna (née Princess Marie of Hesse)->Maria Alexandrovna of Russia, Duchess of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha->Marie of Edinburgh, Queen of Romania->King Carol II->King Michael I->Crown Princess Margareta

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Amalie of Hesse-Darmstadt, Hereditary Princess of Baden->Wilhelmine of Baden, Grand Duchess of Hesse and by Rhine->Tsarina Maria Alexandrovna (née Princess Marie of Hesse)->Maria Alexandrovna of Russia, Duchess of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha->Marie of Edinburgh, Queen of Romania->King Carol II->King Michael I->Crown Princess Margareta

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Frederica Louisa of Hesse-Darmstadt, Queen of Prussia->King Frederick William III of Prussia->Tsarina Alexandra Feodorovna (née Princess Charlotte of Prussia)->Grand Duke Konstantin Nikolayevich of Russia->Olga Constantinovna of Russia, Queen of Greece->King Constantine I of Greece->Helen of Greece and Denmark, Queen Mother of Romania->King Michael I->Crown Princess Margareta

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Frederica Louisa of Hesse-Darmstadt, Queen of Prussia->King Frederick William III of Prussia->William I, German Emperor->Frederick III, German Emperor->Sophia of Prussia, Queen of Greece->Helen of Greece and Denmark, Queen Mother of Romania->King Michael I->Crown Princess Margareta

Serbia

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Amalie of Hesse-Darmstadt, Hereditary Princess of Baden->Grand Duke Charles of Baden->Josephine of Baden, Princess of Hohenzollern-Sigmaringen->Leopold, Prince of Hohenzollern->King Ferdinand I of Romania->Maria of Romania, Queen of Yugoslavia->King Peter II->Crown Prince Alexander

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Grand Duke Louis I of Hesse->Grand Duke Louis II of Hesse->Tsarina Maria Alexandrovna (née Princess Marie of Hesse)->Maria Alexandrovna of Russia, Duchess of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha->Marie of Edinburgh, Queen of Romania->Maria of Romania, Queen of Yugoslavia->King Peter II->Crown Prince Alexander

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Amalie of Hesse-Darmstadt, Hereditary Princess of Baden->Wilhelmine of Baden, Grand Duchess of Hesse and by Rhine->Tsarina Maria Alexandrovna (née Princess Marie of Hesse)->Maria Alexandrovna of Russia, Duchess of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha->Marie of Edinburgh, Queen of Romania->Maria of Romania, Queen of Yugoslavia->King Peter II->Crown Prince Alexander

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Frederica Louisa of Hesse-Darmstadt, Queen of Prussia->King Frederick William III of Prussia->Tsarina Alexandra Feodorovna (née Princess Charlotte of Prussia)->Grand Duke Konstantin Nikolayevich of Russia->Olga Constantinovna of Russia, Queen of Greece->King Constantine I of Greece->King Alexander of Greece->Alexandra of Greece and Denmark, Queen of Yugoslavia->Crown Prince Alexander

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Frederica Louisa of Hesse-Darmstadt, Queen of Prussia->King Frederick William III of Prussia->William I, German Emperor->Frederick III, German Emperor->Sophia of Prussia, Queen of Greece->King Alexander of Greece->Alexandra of Greece and Denmark, Queen of Yugoslavia->Crown Prince Alexander

Germany (Prussia)

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Frederica Louisa of Hesse-Darmstadt, Queen of Prussia->King Frederick William III of Prussia->William I, German Emperor->Frederick III, German Emperor->Wilhelm II, German Emperor->Wilhelm, German Crown Prince->Louis Ferdinand, Prince of Prussia->Prince Louis Ferdinand of Prussia->Georg Friedrich, Prince of Prussia

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Grand Duke Louis I of Hesse->Grand Duke Louis II of Hesse->Tsarina Maria Alexandrovna (née Princess Marie of Hesse)->Maria Alexandrovna of Russia, Duchess of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha->Victoria Melita of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha, Grand Duchess Victoria Feodorovna of Russia->Grand Duchess Kira Kirillovna of Russia, Princess of Prussia->Prince Louis Ferdinand of Prussia->Georg Friedrich, Prince of Prussia

Russia

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Grand Duke Louis I of Hesse->Grand Duke Louis II of Hesse->Tsarina Maria Alexandrovna (née Princess Marie of Hesse)->Maria Alexandrovna of Russia, Duchess of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha->Victoria Melita of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha, Grand Duchess Victoria Feodorovna of Russia->Grand Duke Vladimir Kirillovich of Russia->Grand Duchess Maria Vladimirovna of Russia

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Frederica Louisa of Hesse-Darmstadt, Queen of Prussia->King Frederick William III of Prussia->William I, German Emperor->Frederick III, German Emperor->Wilhelm II, German Emperor->Prince Joachim of Prussia->Prince Karl Franz of Prussia->Prince Franz Wilhelm of Prussia (ex-husband of Grand Duchess Maria Vladimirovna)

Italy (Savoy)

Main

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Amalie of Hesse-Darmstadt, Hereditary Princess of Baden->Grand Duke Charles of Baden->Josephine of Baden, Princess of Hohenzollern-Sigmaringen->Marie of Hohenzollern-Sigmaringen, Countess of Flanders->King Albert I of Belgium->Marie-José of Belgium, Queen of Italy->Vittorio Emanuele, Prince of Naples

Aosta

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Frederica Louisa of Hesse-Darmstadt, Queen of Prussia->King Frederick William III of Prussia->Tsarina Alexandra Feodorovna (née Princess Charlotte of Prussia)->Grand Duke Konstantin Nikolayevich of Russia->Olga Constantinovna of Russia, Queen of Greece->King Constantine I of Greece->Irene of Greece and Denmark, Duchess of Aosta->Prince Amedeo, 5th Duke of Aosta->Prince Aimone, 6th Duke of Aosta

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Frederica Louisa of Hesse-Darmstadt, Queen of Prussia->King Frederick William III of Prussia->William I, German Emperor->Frederick III, German Emperor->Sophia of Prussia, Queen of Greece->Irene of Greece and Denmark, Duchess of Aosta->Prince Amedeo, 5th Duke of Aosta->Prince Aimone, 6th Duke of Aosta

Louis IX, Landgrave of Hesse-Darmstadt->Frederica Louisa of Hesse-Darmstadt, Queen of Prussia->King Frederick William III of Prussia->Tsarina Alexandra Feodorovna (née Princess Charlotte of Prussia)->Grand Duke Konstantin Nikolayevich of Russia->Olga Constantinovna of Russia, Queen of Greece->Prince Christopher of Greece and Denmark->Prince Michael of Greece and Denmark->Olga of Greece, Duchess of Aosta
